column1: Local Foods////I love love love this place!! As every other review states here. It's probably my all time favorite sandwich shop. You'd definitely have to have somewhat of a diverse palate to really appreciate everything here (I used to be really picky and found it really hard to get anything I really liked
column2: but when I started trying more things
column3: everything I got I liked.) I normally am a person to just stick to one order per restaurant
column4: but every time I come here
column5: I like to get something different because everything is seriously just that good. The crunchy chicken and salmon bagel are among my favorites overall
column7: nothing has ever disappointed here. Really glad that they have more than one super close location
column8: because the parking can be a little difficult for both areas.
